name: Dangerous Organizations and Individuals
description: Policy preventing organizations/individuals with violent missions or engaged in violence from having platform presence. Assesses entities based on behavior and ties to violence.
corePrinciple: Prevent and disrupt offline harm by not allowing organizations or individuals that proclaim violent missions or engage in violence to have platform presence. Two-tier system based on severity of offline harms.

tier1.name: Tier 1 - Most Extensive Enforcement
tier1.description: Entities engaging in serious offline harms against civilians
tier1.enforcement: Remove ALL references, glorification, support, and representation, including unclear or positive references

entityTypes.name: Terrorist Organizations, Individuals, and Media Wings
entityTypes.definition: Non-state actors engaging in/advocating purposive planned violence causing death/injury to civilians to coerce/intimidate population/government for political/religious/ideological aims

entityTypes.name: Hate Organizations, Figures, Domains, and Bands
entityTypes.definition: Association of 3+ people organized under name/sign/symbol with ideology/statements/actions attacking individuals based on protected characteristics

entityTypes.name: Criminal Organizations
entityTypes.definition: Non-governmental orgs (cartels, gangs, trafficking groups) committing serious offenses for financial/territorial gain

entityTypes.name: Violating Violent Events (VVE)
entityTypes.definition: Intentional act of high-severity violence by non-state actor against civilian targets outside armed conflict
signals: Intentional high-severity violence or attempt
Perpetrator is non-state actor or rogue government actor
Targets civilians/civilian property outside active hostilities
Not in context of armed conflict or war
Risk of on-platform Glorification, Support or Representation

tier2.name: Tier 2 - Moderate Enforcement
tier2.description: Groups engaging in violence against state/military actors, not generally targeting civilians
tier2.enforcement: Remove glorification, material support, and representation (but NOT mere references)

entityTypes.name: Violent Non-State Actors (VNSA)
entityTypes.definition: Non-state actors engaging in planned violence primarily against government/military, may also attack civilians

subtypes.name: Militarized Social Movements
subtypes.definition: Social movements calling for civic violence/civil war, distributing weapons info, developing armed networks

subtypes.name: Violence Inducing Conspiracy Networks
subtypes.definition: Non-state actors promoting debunked theories attributing violent behavior, advocating real-world violence

subtypes.name: Hate-Banned Entities
subtypes.definition: Entities with repeated hateful conduct not rising to Tier 1 due to lack of explicit violence advocacy

references.name: References
references.definition: Referring to designated entity including positive references without mentioning violent/hateful activities
examples: Hamas is my hero
Rest in peace Bin Laden
‚ù§Ô∏è Lawrence Bishnoi
Tim McVeigh is a patriot
Incidental depiction (DOI secondary in background)
Captionless photos without explicit RGSR context
Unclear satire/humor unless explicitly condemning
notViolating: Stating entity is/is not a threat
Stating entity should not be considered dangerous

glorification.name: Glorification
glorification.definition: Content justifying or amplifying DOI harmful/hateful/violent activity to characterize as effective, legitimate, or defensible

types.name: Legitimizing/Defending
types.description: Claiming violent/hateful acts have moral, political, logical justification making them acceptable
examples: 9/11 was the right response to the American war against Islam
Tim McVeigh was a patriot. Sometimes you need to shake up the world
Hitler did nothing wrong

types.name: Celebrating/Characterizing Achievement
types.description: Characterizing violence or hate as achievement or accomplishment
examples: Well done
King behavior
Hizbul Mujahideen is winning the war for a free Kashmir

types.name: Aspirational Membership
types.description: Statement of desire to be designated entity or perpetrator of VVE
examples: I wish I can join ISIS and be part of the Khilafah
3%ers are true inspiration. I should join

support.name: Support
support.definition: Content providing tangible financial, operational, or strategic advantage to designated entity

categories.name: Material Aid
examples: Free martial arts lessons for Rise Above Movement members
If you want to send care packages to Sinaloa Cartel, use this address

categories.name: Improving Financial Status
examples: Donate to the Islamic State's KickStarter!
I'll give the KKK a dollar for every like & share
Free tax preparation services for Proud Boys

categories.name: Recruiting
examples: Join the only sensical political party, join TLP
If you want to go to Syria and fight for the caliphate, DM me
I can show you the 1488 life

otherSupport.name: Other Support
otherSupport.condition: Must NOT include glorification of violence/hate

categories.name: Calls to Action
categories.definition: Directing audience to act or not act to further entity/cause
examples: Contact us via Jabhat Al-Nusra Telegram
View Aryan Nations' website for more information
All proud white men should support the Nazi party

categories.name: Channeling Information
categories.definition: Distributing official communications on behalf of DOI
signals: Known watermark from DOI media wing
Content generated by media wing
Caption states produced by/on behalf of DOI
Leader/spokesperson speaking about organization
Attempting to sell/buy/trade works authored by DOI
examples: Posting official communication with no/nonsense caption
Posting video/audio by hate figure
Directly quoting DOI outside allowable context
Creating 'unofficial' or 'fan' page for DOI

representation.name: Representation
representation.definition: Presenting oneself as a designated entity

types.name: Explicit Statement of Membership
examples: I am a grand dragon of the KKK
I stormed the Capitol on January 6th, and proud of it!
I joined Hizbul Mujahideen to fight for Kashmir

types.name: Creating/Maintaining Complex Object
types.description: Page, group, account, event claiming to be DOI or run on their behalf
examples: Page title: Osama Bin Laden
Group title: American Nazi Party
Group cover photo with ISIS Flag
Event: Official Annual Meeting of Nazi Party 2019
types.exception: If says 'unofficial' or 'fan account', treat as Support instead

types.name: Admin Control
types.description: Assets controlled by admins who are leaders/prominent members of DOI

socialPoliticalDiscourse.name: Social and Political Discourse
socialPoliticalDiscourse.description: Allowed contexts for discussing DOI without RGSR
requirements: Does NOT include Glorification, Support, or Representation
Context explicitly mentioned or unambiguous intent

contexts.name: Elections Context
contexts.definition: DOI officially registered in formal electoral process

contexts.name: Parliamentary and Executive Functions
contexts.definition: DOI is member of parliament or holds official government position

contexts.name: Conflict Resolution
contexts.definition: DOI involved in peace process, truce, ceasefire, UN resolutions

contexts.name: Disaster Response and Humanitarian Relief
contexts.definition: DOI plays role in response to natural/human-made disasters

contexts.name: Local Community Services
contexts.definition: DOI is key provider of essential services (garbage, education, electricity, healthcare)

contexts.name: Human Rights and Humanitarian Discourse
contexts.definition: Defending human rights of DOIs or calls for action based on humanitarian reasons
includes: Right to be free from torture/capital punishment
Calls for humane treatment in incarceration

contexts.name: Neutral Discussion and Fictional Depiction
contexts.definition: Factual statements, commentary, questions without normative language
examples: White Supremacy is not a threat
Naziism doesn't matter
Shaheed Burhan Wani was born in 1994 (biography)

contexts.name: News Reporting
signals: Result of editorial intervention by news outlet
Does not include glorification or incitement
Does not amplify DOI messages or encourage imitative behaviors
Outlet not affiliated to DOI or designated media wing

contexts.name: Condemnation and Criticism
contexts.definition: Expression of negative perspective without reservation
examples: I feel disgusted by the crime of Salvador Ramos
Hitler's crimes shall never be forgotten

contexts.name: Satire and Humor
contexts.definition: Content comparing DOI with non-DOI OR condemning/ridiculing/discrediting DOI
examples: I am a complete blood thirsty criminal but people treat me as a philosopher - Pablo Escobar (satirical)
The President's policies would even put Hitler's Third Reich to shame

contexts.name: Legal Discussion
contexts.definition: Discussion of laws, punishments, charges, legal defenses
examples: First degree murder charge isn't appropriate, doesn't seem premeditated
Hamas should not be considered terrorist organization because...
They are innocent, they were protecting themselves

perpetratorContent.name: Perpetrator-Generated Content
perpetratorContent.definition: Imagery filmed/created by perpetrator during attack or directly related

thirdPartyContent.definition: Third party content depicting moment of attack on visible victims
thirdPartyContent.visibleVictim: Victim seen in imagery at some point, need not be shown simultaneously with violence

symbolsAndSlogans.definition: Visuals expressing underlying character, mission, ideology of DOI
symbolsAndSlogans.contextSpecific: Some symbols used by multiple orgs - assess context

variations.note: Still violating if main features recognizable

shaheedContext.rule: Shaheed + no signal of violence = Neutral (SPD)
violenceSignals: Statement of intent to use weapon

quotations.rule: Attributed quotes = Support unless in allowable SPD context

types.name: Direct Harm
signals: Target + high severity violence + statement of intent/call for action/conditional/admission
Target + intent to kidnap or admission of kidnapping

types.name: Bomb Threats
signals: Statement of intent/call for action for bomb threats (excluding nuclear)
Instructions on making bombs

types.name: Fighting
signals: Admission/intent to conduct real world attacks
Offer services as contract killer
Publish manifesto with intent/call for violence

types.name: Instructing
signals: Instructions that could cause real world harm (how to make poison, stab, carry weapons through security)

removeConditions: No subject element violations AND 3 severe strikes
No subject element violations AND 5 standard strikes
No subject element violations AND 3 severe strikes
No subject element violations AND 5 standard strikes
No subject element violations AND 3 severe strikes or 5 standard strikes in last 90 days

disableConditions: User is Admin of violating Complex Object

glossary.civilian: Individual not member of state armed forces or militarized non-state actors AND not directly participating in armed hostilities
glossary.designated_entity: All individuals and organizations designated under DOI policy including leaders and prominent members
glossary.glorification: Legitimizing/defending violent acts OR celebrating violence as achievement OR aspirational statement of membership
glossary.news_reporting: Sharing reliable information by news outlets to increase situational awareness without glorification/incitement
glossary.non_state_actor: Individuals/organizations not controlled by or administratively affiliated with a state
glossary.reference: Referring to DOI including positive references without mentioning violent/hateful activities
glossary.representation: Presenting oneself as designated entity - membership statement OR creating entity claiming to be DOI
glossary.support: Content providing tangible financial, operational, or strategic advantage to DOI
glossary.material_support: Material aid + improving financial status + recruiting
glossary.other_support: Calls to action + channeling information (without glorification)
glossary.perpetrator: Individual who carries out, facilitates, or participates in designated VVE
